body: Okay so everytime I log on Avicus I have the same issue, after 10 mins or so everything just freeze and I get dissconnected. This happens on only avicus and no other server. If anyone have any idea what could help please tell me.
body_tagged: Okay so everytime I log on Avicus I have the same issue, after 10 mins or so everything just freeze and I get dissconnected. This happens on only avicus and no other server. If anyone have any idea what could help please tell me.
title: Help me!

replies.body:
this happened to me before... you can either:
1)wait it out
2)try to fix it:
a)clear your internet cache
b)restart your router
c)restart your adapter connection
replies.body_tagged:
this happened to me before... you can either:

b)restart your router

replies.body: I'm having that issue too, yesterday I got timed out over 15 times. Today it has only happened twice and doesn't have to do with my internet, it's the server.
replies.body_tagged: I'm having that issue too, yesterday I got timed out over 15 times. Today it has only happened twice and doesn't have to do with my internet, it's the server.

replies.body:
also, this might help:
use one of the alt ips:
avic.us
avicus.net
play.avicus.net
mczone.co
skywars.co
